description: Manage the VPN client connection ipsec-policy for P2S client connection of the virtual network gateway.

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway vpn-client ipsec-policy set
commands.summary: Set the VPN client connection ipsec policy per P2S client connection of the virtual network gateway.
examples: az network vnet-gateway vpn-client ipsec-policy set -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVnetGateway --dh-group DHGroup14 --ike-encryption AES256 --ike-integrity SHA384 --ipsec-encryption DES3 --ipsec-integrity GCMAES256 --pfs-group PFS2048 --sa-lifetime 27000 --sa-max-size 102400000

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway vpn-client ipsec-policy show
commands.summary: Get the VPN client connection ipsec policy per P2S client connection of the virtual network gateway.
commands.syntax:
az network vnet-gateway vpn-client ipsec-policy show [--ids]
                                                     [--name]
                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                     [--subscription]
examples: az network vnet-gateway vpn-client ipsec-policy show -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVnetGateway

commands.name: az network vnet-gateway vpn-client ipsec-policy wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network vnet-gateway vpn-client ipsec-policy wait [--created]
                                                     [--custom]
                                                     [--deleted]
                                                     [--exists]
                                                     [--ids]
                                                     [--interval]
                                                     [--name]
                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                     [--subscription]
                                                     [--timeout]
                                                     [--updated]
